alert.note: Alert for Greene; Perry (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 5:26PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Perry and Greene Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 525 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southeast of Richton, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Richton and Leakesville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
